name: Ritz on a Roll - Standalone Edition
name_original: Ritz on a Roll - Standalone Edition
description:
This is a fangame based on the cute li'l mascot platformer by Ninjamuffin & Friends for last year's pixel day. Ritz the rat has to stop an evil felis bara from mind controlling all the rodents in the world!

  • Arrow keys to move and aim. You can aim up and diagonally but not down!
  • Z to jump (you can double jump by the way!)
  • X to shoot
  • Try not to get hit too much
  • Grab cheese to restore health
  • Drink plenty of liquids and remember to take your vitamins

Art & Progamming by me (Chdonga)

Music by JX(aka @Jungjongsoo_)

Sound effects from various sources

Support the creators of Ritz and check out their original work!

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/746874
